name: Nimblefoot
description:
Nimblefoot is an action-packed parkour game where players must outrun and outsmart primitive hunters in pursuit. In Nimblefoot, you'll need to use all your skills to avoid obstacles and fend off monsters lurking in the forest.

Players must master the art of jumping, rolling, and attacking as they navigate through the dangerous terrain. Use the W key to jump and the S key to roll and attack enemies. The A and D keys allow players to move left or right. Collect coins along the way to unlock new characters.

With immersive 3D graphics, Nimblefoot offers a thrilling adventure through a prehistoric world filled with danger and excitement. Race through lush forests, dodge obstacles, and battle ferocious beasts in a quest to escape the hunters and become the ultimate parkour champion.

Can you survive the chase and escape the hunters? Join the adventure and find out in Nimblefoot!
